title: [1.7.2/1.6.X/1.5.2][SSP/SMP]地图生成 沉船世界 SHIPWRECK WORLD GENERATION
author: xgty7788
txt_content:
本帖最后由 xgty7788 于 2014-7-28 18:36 编辑 

简介  
增加了沉船，海洋和沙滩生物群落。有纯装饰的小船，还有有箱子的较大的船舶。
目前增加4种不同的沉船：划艇，帆船，直立帆船，倒在一侧的帆船，和一个大帆船。
有随机战利品的箱子，以及提供一些很好的收获的帆船。



船舶设计图片预览  

注：关于截图是作者修改生成率得到，MOD实际生成没这么丰富。


划艇



直立帆船：




倾斜帆船：
生成一个随机的长度和方向的船，附近有个箱子。很容易在陆地上找到，而在海洋中比较难。



大帆船：
纵帆船默认了云杉木和丛林木的木板的甲板船体。
每个端口孔持有发射器，有9箭头留在里面。






中型船：


更新日志  
大致说更新了一中怪物食人鱼，一种新的大船，还有潜水服。酱紫。什么时候有空再整理过。。。。。（不负责任）


v1.6.2, 4/9/2014Updated the mod to 1.7.2Increased attack speed of Piranhas from every 20 sec to every 3 sec.Increased damage of Piranhas from 1/2 a heart to 1.5 hearts (unarmored).Added an option in the config to disable the Diving Suit.Shipwrecks will now appear in Deep Oceans, Frozen Oceans, and on Cold Beaches.
v1.6.1, 1/20/2014Fixed a bug that would cause the game to crash when killed by Piranhas.Removed the mob ID conflict
v1.6.0, 1/16/2014Added a new ship, the Waverunner! This is the largest ship to date. You will drown if you dont prepare correctly.Added the first hostile mob, a Piranha! These nasty fish swim in schools. A single fish wont do much damage, but in groups they can kill you in a matter of seconds. Luckily 1 hit with a diamond sword, or 2 with a stone or better sword will kill these fish. They can swim faster than you, so be prepared to fight them.Added custom armor, the diving suit! Wearing the helmet will give you nightvision. This armor provides the same protection as iron armor, but is slightly more durable. The armor will also add slowness if worn outside of the water,note that this effect will occur if you are bobbing on top of the water (when you hold space, you clear the top water block completely). Each piece of armor worn will add 1 level of slowness, to a max of slowness 4.Added an option to the config to remove dispensers from ships. As dispensers are tileEntities, they can cause a large amount of lag (especially in large groups).Config files have been renamed. Im using better code to generate the config files. As a result, config files for FTB should now appear in the config folder of the associated modpack.Increased default rarity of shipwrecks.Some minor performance fixes.Full changelog available here.
V1.5.2，2013年9月27日
新增了能够设置沉船的最小值和最大值之间的距离。删除你的配置，船的稀有性已经大大改变！
物品现在出现在1.6.x的单桅帆船货舱箱前。
帆船不会再在树上产生。
一些小的错误修正。
V1.5.1，2013年9月24日
改进了世界一代略有下降。船舶相邻的可能性降低。
修正单桅帆船的生成，使船体的完整性加强。
小帆船现在非常小或者有损坏
1.6.x版兼容1.6.2、1.6.4和1.6.3。
v1.5，2013年9月14日
添加了一艘有4门大炮的中型单桅杆帆船（已上图），船内有货舱和船员室。还添加了一个选项来配置。




自用截图
